title: How to Prepare Half a Box of Macaroni and Cheese

steps.headline: Fill a small pot with water and set on medium/high to boil while you prepare the rest of the ingredients.
Measure out just under 2/3 cups of dry macaroni.
Once the water starts boiling, pour in the dry macaroni and set a timer for seven minutes though it may take longer-check for doneness & stir frequently.
Measure out 2 TBSP of milk and 1/2 TBSP of margarine or butter (or 2 TBSP margarine or butter for "classic prep").
Rip off the top of the packet of cheese sauce mix and measure out 2 TBS of powdered cheese sauce mix (there are 4 TBSP in each packet, so we're only using half).
After the macaroni has cooked, pour out the excess water, using a large spoon to prevent the noodles from falling into the sink or use a colander to drain then return noodles to pan.
steps.description: Then add the milk, margarine/butter and cheese sauce mix.

text: Fill a small pot with water and set on medium/high to boil while you prepare the rest of the ingredients.  Measure out just under 2/3 cups of dry macaroni.  Once the water starts boiling, pour in the dry macaroni and set a timer for seven minutes though it may take longer-check for doneness & stir frequently.  Measure out 2 TBSP of milk and 1/2 TBSP of margarine or butter (or 2 TBSP margarine or butter for "classic prep").  Rip off the top of the packet of cheese sauce mix and measure out 2 TBS of powdered cheese sauce mix (there are 4 TBSP in each packet, so we're only using half).  After the macaroni has cooked, pour out the excess water, using a large spoon to prevent the noodles from falling into the sink or use a colander to drain then return noodles to pan. Then add the milk, margarine/butter and cheese sauce mix. Stir until mixed and enjoy!
